ygData.subject: Re: Kunark and new stuff
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Let me guess.  The levels after 50 are all hellish enough that other classes get new spells at the increased rate of every level instead of every 4-5.  We
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 1 Mar 2000, B. Bedford wrote:
>
> Also, don't forget that all of the levels after 50 are
> going to be extreme hell levels (from what we've all
> heard)...so any new spells you get should be a real
> reward...I'm sure we bards have something coming for us,
> as well.

Let me guess. The levels after 50 are all hellish enough that
other classes get new spells at the increased rate of every
level instead of every 4-5. We will still get one song per
level though...

I *really* hate level-based systems...

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
